content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, it's great to have you expressing interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let's focus solely on the rental price discussion for now. To start the negotiation, I have an initial price in mind which is considerably higher than what I'm willing to accept in the end. I propose the rental price of 1250 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I was thinking more around 800 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial goal is to obtain a significantly higher rent than what you suggested. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
